title: Varus is buggy
body:
Hello riot guys,

i've been playing Varus quite a lot recently and have been experiencing a pretty massive bug interaction.

What frequently happens is: if you hold down his q for a long time before you release it it delays the release after you press ist.
Especially on q hold down varus feels a bit buggy and laggy in general.
I doubt it is being caused by lag i think its a coding issue.

My settings: i play smartcast and arclight varus.

I did not check yet if the bugs happen on other skins as well, maybe you wanna investigate there :)

Thanks for caring!
Best regards
Jukaron
